content: Total non-GAAP operating expense amounted to $75 million and approximately 89% of the sales in the second quarter compared to $57 million and 92% of sales in the prior year period, delivering a total of 320 basis points of operating leverage year-over-year. Adjusted EBITDA was a loss of $8 million and approximately 10% of sales in the second quarter compared to a $7 million loss and 11% of sales in the prior year period, an improvement of 80 basis points as a percent of sales.
